run_info.input_toml:
# Test case to verify compression is detected even when file extension is wrong
# This tests that niffler correctly detects compression by content, not extension

[input]
# Gzipped file with wrong .txt extension - should still be detected as compressed
read1 = 'input_gzipped_wrong_extension.txt'
# Zstd compressed file with wrong .fq extension - should still be detected as compressed  
read2 = 'input_zstd_wrong_extension.fq'

[output]
prefix = 'output'
format = 'Raw'
report_json = true


[[step]]
	action = "ReverseComplement"
	segment = "read2"

# Simple processing to verify files can be read correctly
[[step]]
action = 'Report'
label = 'files_processed'
count = true
